dhp100-115:100: Sahassamapi ce vācā,anatthapadasaṁhitā;Ekaṁ atthapadaṁ seyyo,yaṁ sutvā upasammati.
dhp100-115:101: Sahassamapi ce gāthā,anatthapadasaṁhitā;Ekaṁ gāthāpadaṁ seyyo,yaṁ sutvā upasammati.
dhp100-115:102: Yo ca gāthā sataṁ bhāse,anatthapadasaṁhitā;Ekaṁ dhammapadaṁ seyyo,yaṁ sutvā upasammati.
dhp100-115:103: Yo sahassaṁ sahassena,saṅgāme mānuse jine;Ekañca jeyyamattānaṁ,sa ve saṅgāmajuttamo.
dhp100-115:104: Attā have jitaṁ seyyo,yā cāyaṁ itarā pajā;Attadantassa posassa,niccaṁ saññatacārino.
dhp100-115:105: Neva devo na gandhabbo,na māro saha brahmunā;Jitaṁ apajitaṁ kayirā,tathārūpassa jantuno.
dhp100-115:106: Māse māse sahassena,yo yajetha sataṁ samaṁ;Ekañca bhāvitattānaṁ,muhuttamapi pūjaye;Sāyeva pūjanā seyyo,yañce vassasataṁ hutaṁ.
dhp100-115:107: Yo ca vassasataṁ jantu,aggiṁ paricare vane;Ekañca bhāvitattānaṁ,muhuttamapi pūjaye;Sāyeva pūjanā seyyo,yañce vassasataṁ hutaṁ.
dhp100-115:108: Yaṁ kiñci yiṭṭhaṁ va hutaṁ va loke,Saṁvaccharaṁ yajetha puññapekkho;Sabbampi taṁ na catubhāgameti,Abhivādanā ujjugatesu seyyo.
dhp100-115:109: Abhivādanasīlissa,niccaṁ vuḍḍhāpacāyino;Cattāro dhammā vaḍḍhanti,āyu vaṇṇo sukhaṁ balaṁ.
dhp100-115:110: Yo ca vassasataṁ jīve,dussīlo asamāhito;Ekāhaṁ jīvitaṁ seyyo,sīlavantassa jhāyino.
dhp100-115:111: Yo ca vassasataṁ jīve,duppañño asamāhito;Ekāhaṁ jīvitaṁ seyyo,paññavantassa jhāyino.
dhp100-115:112: Yo ca vassasataṁ jīve,kusīto hīnavīriyo;Ekāhaṁ jīvitaṁ seyyo,vīriyamārabhato daḷhaṁ.
dhp100-115:113: Yo ca vassasataṁ jīve,apassaṁ udayabbayaṁ;Ekāhaṁ jīvitaṁ seyyo,passato udayabbayaṁ.
dhp100-115:114: Yo ca vassasataṁ jīve,apassaṁ amataṁ padaṁ;Ekāhaṁ jīvitaṁ seyyo,passato amataṁ padaṁ.
dhp100-115:115: Yo ca vassasataṁ jīve,apassaṁ dhammamuttamaṁ;Ekāhaṁ jīvitaṁ seyyo,passato dhammamuttamaṁ.
